Package com.axelor.utils.service.dmsfile

Interface DmsFileService

All Known Implementing Classes:
DmsFileServiceImpl
public interface DmsFileService

    Method
    Description
    void
    addLinkedDMSFiles(List<? extends com.axelor.db.Model> entityList, com.axelor.db.Model entityMerged)
    Given any Model object and a list of model objects, it changes the DMS file of any object in the list by linked them to the object merged .
    List<com.axelor.dms.db.DMSFile>
    fetchAttachedDMSFiles(com.axelor.db.Model model)
    Given any model present in database, returns the list of every DMSFile representing a file (excluding folders) attached to this model.

  • Method Details

    • fetchAttachedDMSFiles

      List<com.axelor.dms.db.DMSFile> fetchAttachedDMSFiles(com.axelor.db.Model model)
      Given any model present in database, returns the list of every DMSFile representing a file (excluding folders) attached to this model.
      Parameters:
      model - any model
      Returns:
      a list of DMSFile related to the given model an empty list if the model is null or has no id.

    • getInlineUrl

      String getInlineUrl(com.axelor.dms.db.DMSFile dmsFile)
      Given any DMS file, returns the inline URL of the DMS file. The inline URL is mostly used to display a PDF file in a viewer in a form view.
      Parameters:
      dmsFile - any DMS file
      Returns:
      the inline URL in a string.

    • addLinkedDMSFiles

      void addLinkedDMSFiles(List<? extends com.axelor.db.Model> entityList, com.axelor.db.Model entityMerged)
      Given any Model object and a list of model objects, it changes the DMS file of any object in the list by linked them to the object merged .
      Parameters:
      entityList - List of Model objects
      entityMerged - Model object

    • getDMSRoot

      com.axelor.dms.db.DMSFile getDMSRoot(com.axelor.db.Model model)
      Given any Model object, returns the DMS file root of the DMS file. The DMS root file is a file with a relatedId equal to 0 and isDirectory with a value set to true display a PDF file in a viewer in a form view.
      Parameters:
      model - DMS file
      Returns:
      the DMS file root .

    • getDMSHome

      com.axelor.dms.db.DMSFile getDMSHome(com.axelor.db.Model model, com.axelor.dms.db.DMSFile dmsRoot)
      Given any Model object and DMS file, returns the DMS file home of the model passed.
      Parameters:
      model - any Model object
      dmsRoot - any dms root file
      Returns:
      the DMS file .
